Name: Hidden Cats in Paris
About the game: Meow meow meow mes amies! More than one hundred cats are hidden in a unique lovely Paris scenario. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. - CONTROLS Left Mouse Button - Click to select a Cat Left Mouse Button - Hold down and drag to move the viewport Mousewheel - Zoon in and out
